00037 struct OrderByTimestamp {
00038   bool operator()(const MetaLogEntryPtr &x, const MetaLogEntryPtr &y)  {
00039     return x->timestamp < y->timestamp;
00040   }
00041 };
00042 
00043 } // local namespace
00044 
00045 RangeServerMetaLog::RangeServerMetaLog(Filesystem *fs, const String &path)
00046     : Parent(fs, path) {
00047   if (! m_newfile)
00048     return;
00049   uint8_t buf[RSML_HEADER_SIZE], *p = buf;
00050   memcpy(buf, RSML_PREFIX, strlen(RSML_PREFIX));
00051   p += strlen(RSML_PREFIX);
00052   encode_i16(&p, RSML_VERSION);
00053 
00054   StaticBuffer sbuf(buf, RSML_HEADER_SIZE, false);
00055 
00056   if (fs->append(fd(), sbuf, 0) != RSML_HEADER_SIZE)
00057     HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, "Error writing range server "
00058               "metalog header to file: %s", path.c_str());
00059 }
00060 
00061 void
00062 RangeServerMetaLog::purge(const RangeStates &rs) {
00063   // write purged entries in a tmp file
00064   String tmp = format("%s%d", path().c_str(), getpid());
00065   int fd = create(tmp, true);
00066   MetaLogEntries entries;
00067 
00068   foreach(const RangeStateInfo *i, rs) {
00069     if (i->transactions.empty()) {
00070       RangeState state;
00071       state.soft_limit = i->range_state.soft_limit;  // fix me!!!
00072       entries.push_back(new_rs_range_loaded(i->table, i->range, state));
00073     }
00074     else foreach (const MetaLogEntryPtr &p, i->transactions)
00075       entries.push_back(p);
00076   }
00077   sort(entries.begin(), entries.end(), OrderByTimestamp());
00078   foreach(MetaLogEntryPtr &e, entries) write(e.get());
00079   fs().close(fd);
00080 
00081   // rename existing log to name.save and tmp file to the log name
00082   {
00083     ScopedLock lock(mutex());
00084     String save = format("%s.save", path().c_str());
00085     fs().rename(path(), save);
00086     fs().rename(tmp, path());
00087   }
00088 
00089   // reopen
00090   Parent::fd(create(path()));
00091 }
